summary: There are worlds, there are humans and there are Others. But there is only one Time which is the border between worlds. What if time breaks down?
cast: Özlem Begtas|Fatih Güler|Sefika Karaaslan|Serhat Karaaslan|Akçay Karaazmak|Yasar Karaazmak|Michaela Rexova|Levent Turan|Naz Turan|Ilkay Özyigit
keywords: driving at night|driving on a dirt road|sleeping in a tent|camera shot of a woman's bare feet|acoustic guitar
title: Reminiscence
